strapiPost.title: Finding You
strapiPost.content:
We have a celebrity walking our streets! Finding You, a movie based on a book by Jenny B. Jones, a teacher in Bentonville at Washington Junior High School, is out in theaters.

  • The book, There You'll Find Me is a story about a young woman who recently lost her brother. She follows in her late brother's footsteps and travels to Ireland where she meets and falls in love with an actor.
  • Jenny uses this moment to encourage others to follow their artistic dreams and passions. As someone from a "small town in Arkansas" accomplished this, she wants you to know you can too.

It looks like most local theaters are screening the movie. If you want more info, you can listen to the full story HERE,
